thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Trump to Call for Bipartisan Approach in Divided Washington

author: Louise Radnofsky
title: Trump to Call for Bipartisan Approach in Divided Washington
text:
WASHINGTON—President Donald Trump will deliver his first State of the Union address on Tuesday calling for bipartisanship in pursuit of an immigration deal and an infrastructure package while touting a strong economy, a senior administration official said.
The speech—described by the official as an opportunity for Mr. Trump to speak to the American people for “60 minutes unfiltered”—will credit tax overhaul legislation and deregulation efforts by the Trump administration for low unemployment, increased wages and stock market...
